name: Real Extreme Racing Car Driving Simulator Free 3D
name_original: Real Extreme Racing Car Driving Simulator Free 3D
description:
Learn to drive manual transmission cars like never before.
Use clutch to shift gears and drive your car.
Amazing gameplay with real traffic violation and rules.
Stunning controls to drive car with tilt motion controls.
On screen indicators , gas and brake pedal for real life driving experience.
Avoid crashing your car in public or police transport or your mission will be failed.
Superb open world environment to drive in traffic jammed city.

Download this amazing game in your device for endless fun and entertainment.


Give us your feedback with comments so we can make more amazing games for you.
